001package org.biopax.ols;

004import java.util.HashSet;

014public class Constants {
015    public static final String OLS_CONFIG_FILE = "ols-config.properties";
016    public static final String OLS_DBALIAS = "OLS_MAIN";
017    public static final String OLS_FAILOVER_DBALIAS = "OLS_FAILOVER";
018
019    public static final int IS_A_RELATION_TYPE_ID = 1;
020    public static final int PART_OF_RELATION_TYPE_ID = 2;
021    public static final int DEVELOPS_FROM_RELATION_TYPE_ID = 3;
022    public static final int OTHER_RELATION_TYPE_ID = 4;
023    public static final int NO_DISTANCE_CONSTRAINT = -1;
024    public static final String DEFINITION = "definition";
025
026    public static final String IS_A_RELATION_TYPE = "is_a";
027    public static final String PART_OF_RELATION_TYPE = "part_of";
028    public static final String DEVELOPS_FROM_RELATION_TYPE = "develops_from";
029    public static final String ALT_ID_SYNONYM_TYPE = "alt_id";
030    public static final String EXACT_SYNONYM_TYPE = "exact";
031    public static final String NARROW_SYNONYM_TYPE = "narrow";
032    public static final String BROAD_SYNONYM_TYPE = "broad";
033    public static final String RELATED_SYNONYM_TYPE = "related";
034    public static final String DEFAULT_SYNONYM_TYPE = "synonym";
035    public static final String ONTOLOGY_NAME_ATTRIBUTE = "loaded_ontology";
036    public static final String PREFERRED_NAME = "preferred name";
037
038    public static final int RETURN_VALUE_OK = 0;
039    public static final int RETURN_VALUE_OK_NO_ONTOLOGIES_LOADED = 1;
040    public static final int RETURN_VALUE_ERROR = 2;
041    public static final int RETURN_VALUE_CVS_ERROR = 3;
042
043    /*
044        These are relationship types that need to be ignored because they
045        will break the ontology browser and the dot executable
046     */
047    public static final Collection RELATIONSHIPS_TO_IGNORE = new HashSet();
048    static {
049        RELATIONSHIPS_TO_IGNORE.add("participates_in");
050        RELATIONSHIPS_TO_IGNORE.add("disjoint_from");
051    }
052}
